description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Admin' that provides an administrative interface. It fetches and displays summary data and a list of users, and allows granting admin rights to a user via UI interactions.

methods.name: Admin()
methods.description: React functional component for admin interface, handles data fetching, user interactions, and state management.

methods.name: refresh()
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches admin summary and users list, updating the component state.

methods.name: handleGrant
methods.description: Handles granting admin rights to a user based on the last user ID, including error handling and state updates.
